action.action-desc: Mr. Green of Tennessee (for himself and Mr. Thompson of Mississippi) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Homeland Security in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

section.text: For the expenses of the Committee on Homeland Security (hereafter in this resolution referred to as the Committee), including the expenses of all staff salaries, there shall be paid, out of the applicable accounts of the House of Representatives for committee salaries and expenses, not more than $20,466,000 for the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

paragraph.text: not more than $10,233,000 shall be available for expenses incurred during the period beginning at noon on January 3, 2025, and ending immediately before noon on January 3, 2026; and
not more than $10,233,000 shall be available for expenses incurred during the period beginning at noon on January 3, 2026, and ending immediately before noon on January 3, 2027.

section.text: Payments under this resolution shall be made on vouchers authorized by the Committee, signed by the Chairman of the Committee, and approved in the manner directed by the Committee on House Administration.
Amounts made available under this resolution shall be expended in accordance with regulations prescribed by the Committee on House Administration.
